string.text:
%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]STONE SKIN
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Passive +15% melee damage protection
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Receiving melee damage grants a stack of 'Stone Skin'
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]+15% melee damage protection/-10% movement speed per 'Stone Skin' stack
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Maximum 10 stacks
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]At 10 stacks, +75% melee damage reduction but become completely immobilized
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts 10 seconds, after which all stacks are removed
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]DISINTEGRATOR
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]-15% bullet damage received
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Reduced damage is converted to radiation
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]LETYSHOPS TIME
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Receive 4% cashback on each purchase
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]CRITICAL ASCENSI0N
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Passive +10% critical hit damage bonus
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Consecutive hits grant stacks of 'Critical Ascensi0n'
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each stack of 'Critical Ascensi0n' grants +5% damage to next shot
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Missing a shot removes all stacks and gives psy damage proportional to the amount of stacks removed
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Bonus can be stacked infinitely as long as you don't miss
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Unequipping all 'Spike' artefacts will remove stacks without penalty
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]LIGHT OF TRANQUILITY
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Restores health and psy health while near campfires
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Amplifies psy recovery artefacts while near campfires
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]MINOR LACERATIONS
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Your weapon loses 50% damage but gains the ability to cause %c[ui_red]bleeding %c[0,209,172,56]damage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Bleeding damage is proportional to weapon damage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Increases chance for enemies to surrender
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]ZONE ALCHEMY
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Grants the ability to transmutate artefacts
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Artefacts can be upgraded to a better tier (Night Star -> Gravi -> Gold Fish), or "mutated" to a different artifact of the same tier (Night Star -> Stone Blood -> Jellyfish)
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Perk/Top-tier artefacts can only be mutated
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each transmutation will consume one 'Bat' artefact
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]SOLAR POWERED
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Grants stat modifiers depending on the current weather:
 %c[0,209,172,56] --- Clear: health and stamina boost
 %c[0,209,172,56] --- Partly Clear: small stamina boost
 %c[0,209,172,56] --- Other: stamina penalty
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]WILL TO LIVE
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Grants health regen while under 25% health
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect increases the closer to you are to death
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]WEIGHT OF DEVOTION
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Passive small health and stamina regen
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Members of Sin are granted triple the effect with the addition of psy health regeneration
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Sin companions receive health regen.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]ARSZI'S BLESSING
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Radiation illness grants a stamina boost and slight radiation removal
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]THE UNORTHODOX WAY OF TRAVELLING
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Killing anyone will teleport you to the location of their death
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Dangerous if used on airborne targets
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]DEAL WITH THE DEVIL
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Moving the artefact to the belt will sign the 'Pact with the Zone'

 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[ui_red]Highly recommended to save before activation.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]INSANITY
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Passive strong psy resistance
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Drains psy health to restore health
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]When health is full, restores psy health
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]There is a chance you will become possessed and perform an uncontrollable action
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The lower your psy health, the higher the chance and severity of the action
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]ZONE INFUSION
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping into anomalies of various types will infuse your active weapon for 3 minutes
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Infused weapon loses 30% damage but gains 50% elemental damage according to the anomaly
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Only electric, thermal and chemical anomalies are valid for infusion
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You can drop an artefact directly onto a weapon to detroy the artefact and infuse the weapon with a random effect for 10 minutes.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]CALORIC COAGULATION
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Drains hunger to cure bleeding
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]DODGE THIS
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]20% chance to reflect 35% of bullet damage recived back to the attacker
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Reflections nullify damage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]NECESSARY GLUTTONY
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Provides health bonus on food consumption based on calories
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]CRACK THE JACKPOT
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon a lethal headshot, extra money is dropped
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]PHANTOM PACIFIST
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Makes you completely invisible
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]1.5 minute total duration
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]During invisibility you may not draw a weapon, talk or 'interact'
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]THE UNLUCKY CHARM
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]35% chance that incoming bullet damage will be fully redirected to your companion
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]May make some companions suspicious...
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]NIGHT OWL
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Bleeding recovery and movement speed increase from dusk till dawn
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Decreases sleepiness at night but increases sleepiness during the day
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]CHARGER
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Restores batteries while sprinting
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Will not restore dead batteries or devices with no batteries
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_red]YES

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]THE NUTCRACKER
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Amplifies player's mighty foot and allows him to kick more mutants, resulting in instant death.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each artefact on the belt allows kicking more monsters.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has a cooldown of 2 seconds with 1 artefact, increases with more artefacts on belt by 1 second with each artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Press USE key when near a mutant and in line of sight to perform a kick
 
 %c[d_orange]Mutant tiers: 
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 1 artefact: %c[ui_gray_3]Cats, Dogs, Tushkano, Rats, Zombies.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 2 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Boars, Flesh, Pseudodogs, Snorks, Lurkers, Fractures.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 3 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Karliks, Bloodsuckers, Psysuckers, Psy-dogs, Poltergeists.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 4 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Burers, Controllers.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 5 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Chimeras, Pseudogiants.

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]KLEPTOMANIA
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stashes and items give off a dim light
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stashes emit signal to RF-Receiver
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]STUNNER
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Chance to stun mutant if within 2 meters
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Getting hit by a melee attack will stun the attacker for 3 seconds
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]While stunned, the enemy is unable to attack
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Self harm (i.e. fall damage) will result in artefact discharge
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]CULINARY HYPERVERSITY
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Convert energy of raw mutant meat into special abilities
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Lasts for 1 minute. Eating different mutant meat will override current effect and restart buff timer

 %c[d_orange]Table of effects:
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Flesh meat: %c[ui_gray_3]1%/sec health regen, 33% bullet damage penalty
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Boar meat: %c[ui_gray_3]25% melee damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Dog meat: %c[ui_gray_3]slight bleeding recovery, 1%/sec psy regen
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Pseudodog: %c[ui_gray_3]2%/sec psy regen, 25% psy damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Bloodsucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until a hostile action is performed, moderate bleeding recovery
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Psysucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until performing a hostile action, 5%/sec psy regen
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Snork: %c[ui_gray_3]50% radiation damage reduction, 5%/sec stamina regen, 5msv/sec radiation cure, large hunger decrease
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Chimera: %c[ui_gray_3]2%/sec health regen, 10%/sec stamina regen, 33% radiation damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Lurker: %c[ui_gray_3]33% chem/fire/electric anomaly damage reduction
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Tushkano: %c[ui_gray_3]20% speed increase, 20% melee damage penalty
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]RAIN OF REVIVAL
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon receiving a fatal blow, the artefact is destroyed and the player is revived
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]50% of health is restored, all debuffs are removed and 5 seconds of damage immunity are granted upon revival
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon revival, the current weapon is dropped and vision is negatively effected
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]HIGH VOLTAGE
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping on an Electra anomaly will recharge batteries and active devices
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping on an Electra anomaly allows infinite sprint for a short period of time
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_red]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]BLOODLUST
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Passive +10% melee damage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]3.5% of melee damage is converted to health
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon killing certain mutants, there is a chance that raw meat will spawn in the vicinity
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO

%c[0,209,172,56]Perk: %c[d_orange]ULTRA-VIOLENCE
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]5% chance that shots will be explosive
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]There is a chance that an npc or mutant killed with an explosive shot will also violently explode
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect stacks with multiple artefacts (chance of an explosion)
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple Artefacts Stack?: %c[ui_green]YES
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Diminishing Returns?: %c[ui_green]NO
